cdm.base.datetime.BusinessDayConventionEnum

  • Packages that use BusinessDayConventionEnum 
    Package Description
    cdm.base.datetime
    Basic date and time concepts: relative date, date range, offset, business centre etc.
    cdm.product.common.schedule
    Common product schedule concepts: calculation period, reset, fixing and payment dates, stub, notional schedule, roll convention.
    cdm.product.common.settlement
    Common product settlement concepts: cash vs physical, non-deliverable, money and cashflow, delivery vs payment.
